read me
info:
The JSON object from P24 is too large to be read in Node-Red.
A string is inputted instead.
The string is too large to convert to JSON object so I 
test to see when the first comma occurs in the string, 
then cut out the rest (that leaves just the press angle JSON object).
The shortened string is then converted to JSON object so the Press Angle can be used.

name: Styling
format:
<style>
    .nr-dashboard-cardpanel {
        padding: 0 !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-template {
        padding: 0 !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }

    #Conveyor_Status_Scrap_Monitoring {

    border: none !important; /* Change the border color and width as needed */

    }
    /* Target the specific card panel */
    #Scrap_Conveyor_Monitor_Scrap_Monitoring {
     //   width: 78vw !important;
        height: 80vh !important;
        width: 1430px !important;
     //   height: 100% !important;
        padding: 5px !important; /* Adjust padding as needed */
        padding-top: 10px !important;
        background-image: url("/home/node-red/project/images/layout.png") !important;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-size: 1500px 700px ;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-ui_table {
   //     border: inset 2px #303030 !important;
   //     border-radius: 5px ; 

    }

    .nr-dashboard-ui_table .tabulator{
        font-size: 24px !important;
       // border: 2px solid black; 
        
    }

    .tabulator-header {
       // display: none !important;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .binLeftFull{
        border: 4px solid;
    }



</style>




<script>
$('#toolbar').css("display", "none")
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(payload) {

    if (payload === true) {
    document.getElementByClassName("tabulator-header").style.display = "none";
} 

});
})(scope);
</script>
